definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Halogen atoms contain seven electrons in their valence shell.
sentences.chinese: 滷原子在它們的介電子層含有七個電子。

sentences.english: Electrons on the outer surface of liquid helium form a nearly ideal two-dimensional electron system.
sentences.chinese: 液氦外表面上的電子層構成一個近理想二維電子系統。

sentences.english: The electron structure of transition elements is permanentlydiffcult point of teaching.
sentences.chinese: 過渡元素原子電子層結構是長期困擾教學過程的難點。
